title: Access Bible Verses from BibleGateway
text: biblegatewayr package provides functions interact BibleGateway web page. includes get_bible_verse retrieve specific verses canonical reference (e.g., “John 3:16”) find_bible_verse search verses containing specific text. functions support multiple Bible versions return formatted output, making easy incorporate Bible verses markdown documents.

title: Access Bible Verses from BibleGateway
text: example demonstrates get specific verse using get_bible_verse. Juan 3:16: Porque de tal manera amó Dios al mundo, que ha dado su Hijo unigénito, para que todo aquel que en él cree, se pierda, mas tenga vida eterna. Salmos 23: 1 Jehová es mi pastor; nada faltará. 2 En lugares de delicados pastos hará descansar; Junto aguas de reposo pastoreará. 3 Confortará mi alma; guiará por sendas de justicia por amor de su nombre. 4 Aunque ande en valle de sombra de muerte, temeré mal alguno, porque tú estarás conmigo; Tu vara y tu cayado infundirán aliento. 5 Aderezas mesa delante de mí en presencia de mis angustiadores; Unges mi cabeza con aceite; mi copa está rebosando. 6 Ciertamente el bien y la misericordia seguirán todos los días de mi vida, Y en la casa de Jehová moraré por largos días.
code: library(biblegatewayr)  # Get the verse John 3:16 get_bible_verse("Juan 3:16") |> cat() # Get the verse Psalm 23 get_bible_verse("Salmos 23") |> cat()

title: Access Bible Verses from BibleGateway
text: package contains two main functions: get_bible_verse(): Retrieves specific Bible verse reference (e.g., “John 3:16”). find_bible_verse(): Searches Bible verses based text query. functions allow specify Bible version. details please refer function documentation ?get_bible_verse ?find_bible_verse.

what: Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
title: Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
text: function searches Bible verses using BibleGateway web site based text query. returns formatted verse text context.

title: Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
text: text_to_find character string representing text search Bible. Spaces converted '+' URL. version character string specifying Bible version use (e.g., "RVR1960", "NIV", "ESV"). Defaults "RVR1960".

title: Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
text: Invisibly returns character vector formatted Bible verse(s) found, NULL verses found. formatted verses also printed console.

title: Find Bible Verses from BibleGateway — find_bible_verse
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Search for a single verse (printing to console) find_bible_verse("el amor es pasciente")  # Search for a verse and capture the result result <- find_bible_verse("fe esperanza amor") # Print result captured. cat(result, sep = "\n")  # Example of no results find_bible_verse("this_is_a_non_sense_query") }

what: Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
title: Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
text: function retrieves specific Bible verse using BibleGateway web site based verse reference query. returns formatted verse text.

title: Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
text: search character string representing Bible verse reference search (e.g., "John 3:16", "Psalm 23"). Spaces converted '+' URL. version character string specifying Bible version use (e.g., "RVR1960", "NIV", "ESV"). Defaults "RVR1960".

title: Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
text: Invisibly returns character string formatted Bible verse, NULL verse found. formatted verse also printed console.

title: Get a Specific Bible Verse from BibleGateway — get_bible_verse
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get a specific verse (printing to console) get_bible_verse("Juan 3:16")  # Get a verse with a different version and capture the output result <- get_bible_verse("Salmos 23") cat(result)  # Example of no results. get_bible_verse("this is a non existing book 1:1") }
